directions: In a bowl stir together ham, chili, Worcestershire sauce, just enough mayonnaise to bind ingredients, and salt and pepper to taste. Chill ham spread, covered, overnight.
ingredients: 1/4 small habanero chili, or to taste, seeded and minced (wear rubber gloves)
Accompaniment: celery boats and/or toast points
title: Mom's Deviled Ham Spread
